1.16.5.1.0.2:
∗ Mowited netherite armor set now uses mowited netherite material again.

    ∗ Mowita blocks are now a bit more slippery and no longer speedy.

    ∗ Now requires Forge 36.1.

        • Updated to official 1.16.5 mappings.
1.16.5.1.0.1:
∗ Brown wolves now randomly emit heart particles. They also gets a bit more darker when wet.

    ∗ Brown wolf spawn eggs now properly work with dispensers, spawners and pick item.
1.16.5.1.0.0:
+ Mod released, all old and future mod versions can be found at https://mods.mowund.com.

        • When a new mod version releases, it will be shown in the mods list.

    + Added brown wolf.

        • Extremely rare, found only in savanna biomes.
        • Stronger than normal wolves.

    ∗ Improved the mod code and removed unused commands.
